aqList.name: How does DETPractice’s plans and pricing work?
aqList.content: We provide transparent plans and pricing for our users, with no hidden fees. Additionally, we offer add-on subscription packages so that you can choose services according to your needs.

aqList.name: Is there a free trial?
aqList.content: Yes! You can view 20 questions for free. Help you understand us before you buy more services.

aqList.name: Do you offer any discounts?
aqList.content: Yes! We offer tailored discounts for each service. However, when you opt for a 30-day service, you'll receive a greater discount compared to other services. Please refer to the price details above for more information.

aqList.name: My payment was successful, but the upgrade failed.
aqList.content: Please contact us via chat or email: support@detpractice.com. This is the simplest and fastest way to address your concerns.

aqList.name: Can I change my plan later?
aqList.content: Thank you for purchasing the service! Please note that this is a virtual product. Once purchased, product delivery is considered complete and is generally non-refundable. Please check before purchasing.

aqList.name: Where do I send my feedback?
aqList.content: You can send feedback through the support chat in the bottom right corner, or contact us via email at support@detpractice.com. Alternatively, you can leave a message directly in the "Contact Us" section.

aqList.name: What is your refund policy?
aqList.content1:
1. Free Account
Usage is entirely free, so there are no refund issues.
aqList.content2:
2. Subscription Plans
Users may request a refund if DET Practice fails to provide the corresponding service, resulting in the user being unable to use it, or if the subscription has not yet taken effect. Refunds will not be issued for subscriptions and services that have already become active after purchase.
aqList.content3:
3. Speaking/Writing Guide
The Speaking/Writing Guide is considered a digital product. Once purchased and downloaded, the product delivery is deemed complete and is generally non-refundable. Please carefully read the purchase information before making a purchase.
aqList.content4:
Important Note:
All refund requests must be processed through customer service, and relevant usage records must be provided for verification.
To prevent fraudulent refunds, each user account is limited to one refund request. Multiple requests will not be processed.
If you have any special circumstances or unique situations, please contact us, and we will work with you to find a resolution.
